files.patch:
@@ -339,1 +339,1 @@ - * {@return a type mirror equal to the argument and with no annotations} + * {@return a type mirror equivalent to the argument, but with no annotations} @@ -345,0 +345,8 @@ + *

For most kinds of type mirrors, the result of + * {@snippet lang="java" : + * types.isSameType(typeMirror, types.stripAnnotations(typeMirror)) + * } + * is {@code true}. The predicate is {@code false} on wildcard + * types for {@linkplain #isSameType(TypeMirror, TypeMirror) + * reasons discussed elsewhere}. + *
